targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  l1_power_1 AS "L1 Leistung WP",
  l2_power_1 AS "L2 Leistung WP",
  l3_power_1 AS "L3 Leistung WP",
  l1_power_2 AS "L1 Leistung Haus",
  l2_power_2 AS "L2 Leistung Haus",
  l3_power_2 AS "L3 Leistung Haus",
  total_power_1 AS "Gesamtleistung WP",
  total_power_2 AS "Gesamtleistung Haus"
FROM data
ORDER BY time

-- calculate the avg energy difference per hour of the day
select
  -- now() time_sec,
	CAST(time_hh as CHAR(50)) Tageszeit,
	avg(delta_l1_energy_2)    L1,
	avg(delta_l2_energy_2)    L2,
	avg(delta_l3_energy_2)    L3
from
	(
	-- lag the time and energy by one and calculate the difference
	select
		time_min,
		lag(time_hh, 1) over (order by time_min) time_hh,
		l1_energy_2_min,
		l2_energy_2_min,
		l3_energy_2_min,
		total_energy_2_min,
		lag(time_min , 1) over (order by time_min) time_lag,
		lag(l1_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) l1_energy_2_lag,
		lag(l2_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) l2_energy_2_lag,
		lag(l3_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) l3_energy_2_lag,
		lag(total_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) total_energy_2_lag,
		TIMEDIFF(time_min, lag(time_min, 1) over (order by time_min)) delta_time,
		l1_energy_2_min - lag(l1_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_l1_energy_2,
		l2_energy_2_min - lag(l2_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_l2_energy_2,
		l3_energy_2_min - lag(l3_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_l3_energy_2,
		total_energy_2_min - lag(total_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_total_energy_2
	from
		(
		-- calculate the minimum energy reading per (day, hour) group
		select
			min(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin')) time_min,
			min(l1_energy_2) l1_energy_2_min,
			min(l2_energy_2) l2_energy_2_min,
			min(l3_energy_2) l3_energy_2_min,
			min(total_energy_2) total_energy_2_min,
			-- calculate average time for all times in group, then take only the hour part
			hour(SEC_TO_TIME(AVG(TIME_TO_SEC(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))))) time_hh
		from
			measurements.data
		group by
			hour(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin')),
			day(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))
		order by
			min(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))
	) mintime
	) deltas
where
	delta_time < "01:00:05"
	and delta_time > "00:59:55"
group BY
	time_hh

-- calculate the avg energy difference per hour of the day
select
	CAST(CAST(time_lag as date) as char(50)) Datum,
	delta_total_energy_1 as WP,
	delta_total_energy_2 as Haus,
	delta_time 
from
	(
	-- lag the time and energy by one and calculate the difference
	select
		time_min,
		total_energy_1_min,
		total_energy_2_min,
		lag(time_min, 1) over (order by time_min) time_lag,
		lag(total_energy_1_min, 1) over (order by time_min) total_energy_1_lag,
		lag(total_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) total_energy_2_lag,
		TIMEDIFF(time_min, lag(time_min, 1) over (order by time_min)) delta_time,
		total_energy_1_min - lag(total_energy_1_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_total_energy_1,
		total_energy_2_min - lag(total_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_total_energy_2
	from
		(
		-- calculate the minimum energy reading per (day, hour) group
		select
			min(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin')) time_min,
			min(total_energy_1) total_energy_1_min,
			min(total_energy_2) total_energy_2_min
		from
			measurements.data
		group by
			day(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))
		order by
			min(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))
	) mintime
	) deltas
-- where
--	delta_time < "24:05:00"
--	and delta_time > "23:55:00"

-- calculate the avg energy difference per hour of the day
select
  -- now() time_sec,
	CAST(time_hh as CHAR(50)) Tageszeit,
	avg(delta_total_energy_1) WP,
	avg(delta_total_energy_2) Haus
from
	(
	-- lag the time and energy by one and calculate the difference
	select
		time_min,
		lag(time_hh, 1) over (order by time_min) time_hh,
		l1_energy_2_min,
		l2_energy_2_min,
		l3_energy_2_min,
		total_energy_1_min,
		total_energy_2_min,
		lag(time_min , 1) over (order by time_min) time_lag,
		lag(l1_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) l1_energy_2_lag,
		lag(l2_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) l2_energy_2_lag,
		lag(l3_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) l3_energy_2_lag,
		lag(total_energy_1_min , 1) over (order by time_min) total_energy_1_lag,
		lag(total_energy_2_min , 1) over (order by time_min) total_energy_2_lag,
		TIMEDIFF(time_min, lag(time_min, 1) over (order by time_min)) delta_time,
		l1_energy_2_min - lag(l1_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_l1_energy_2,
		l2_energy_2_min - lag(l2_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_l2_energy_2,
		l3_energy_2_min - lag(l3_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_l3_energy_2,
		total_energy_1_min - lag(total_energy_1_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_total_energy_1,
		total_energy_2_min - lag(total_energy_2_min, 1) over (order by time_min) delta_total_energy_2
	from
		(
		-- calculate the minimum energy reading per (day, hour) group
		select
			min(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin')) time_min,
			min(l1_energy_2) l1_energy_2_min,
			min(l2_energy_2) l2_energy_2_min,
			min(l3_energy_2) l3_energy_2_min,
			min(total_energy_1) total_energy_1_min,
			min(total_energy_2) total_energy_2_min,
			-- calculate average time for all times in group, then take only the hour part
			hour(SEC_TO_TIME(AVG(TIME_TO_SEC(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))))) time_hh
		from
			measurements.data
		group by
			hour(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin')),
			day(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))
		order by
			min(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))
	) mintime
	) deltas
where
	delta_time < "01:00:05"
	and delta_time > "00:59:55"
group BY
	time_hh

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  l1_energy_1 AS "L1 Energie WP",
  l2_energy_1 AS "L2 Energie WP",
  l3_energy_1 AS "L3 Energie WP",
  l1_energy_2 AS "L1 Energie Haus",
  l2_energy_2 AS "L2 Energie Haus",
  l3_energy_2 AS "L3 Energie Haus",
  total_energy_1 AS "Gesamtenergie WP",
  total_energy_2 AS "Gesamtenergie Haus"
FROM data
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  total_power_1 AS "WP",
  total_power_2 AS "Haus"
FROM data
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  total_energy_1 AS "WP",
  total_energy_2 AS "Haus"
FROM data
ORDER BY time

select 
cast(min(hour(CONVERT_TZ(time, 'UTC', 'Europe/Berlin'))) as char(50)) local_time, 
sum(delta_total_energy_1) WP,
sum(delta_total_energy_2) Haus
from `data` d 
where delta_total_energy_1 is not NULL
and delta_total_energy_2 is not NULL 
and delta_time > 55
and delta_time < 65
GROUP by hour(time)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  delta_total_energy_1 AS "WP",
  delta_total_energy_2 AS "Haus",
  delta_time AS "Zeitintervall"
FROM data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  l1_voltage_1 AS "L1 Spannung WP",
  l2_voltage_1 AS "L2 Spannung WP",
  l3_voltage_1 AS "L3 Spannung WP",
  l1_voltage_2 AS "L1 Spannung Haus",
  l2_voltage_2 AS "L2 Spannung Haus",
  l3_voltage_2 AS "L3 Spannung Haus"
FROM data
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  frequency_1 AS "Frequenz WP",
  frequency_2 AS "Frequenz Haus"
FROM data
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  l1_voltage_1
FROM data
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  frequency_1
FROM data
ORDER BY time
